title: Entertainment: Movies (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Movies subcategory within Entertainment. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Some famous Japanese movie directors are Akira Kurosawa, Yoji Yamada and Takeshi Kitano.
cards.romaji: Y.meina nihonjin eiga kantoku ni wa, Kurosawa Akira, Yamada Y ji, Kitano Takeshi ga imasu.
cards.japanese: 有名な日本人映画監督には、黒澤明、山田洋次、北野武がいます。
